entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
